data.title: Online World of Wrestling
data.text:
Title History

OVW Heavyweight title defeating Elijah Burke (April 16, 2005);

FNW (Far North Wrestling) Heavyweight title defeating Calvin Mcgrath (November 10, 2006);

TNA (Total Nonstop Action) World Tag Team titles w/Hernandez defeating The British Invasion (January 17, 2010);

TNA (Total Nonstop Action) World Tag Team titles w/Crimson defeating Mexican America (November 17, 2011);

NWA FUW (National Wrestling Alliance Florida Underground Wrestling) heavyweight title defeating The Grease (October 26, 2013);

Career Highlights

Tough Enough & Ohio Valley Wrestling:

Matt Morgan was part of Tough Enough II but left the show due to injury..

April 2002: Matt Morgan signs a developmental deal with the World Wrestling Federation and is assigned to OVW..

July 24, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: Doug Basham and Damaja defeated Matt Morgan and David Flair.

August 21, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: Matt Morgan defeated Travis Bain by disqualification.

September 4, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: Matt Morgan and Mark Henry defeated Seven and Travis Bain.

October 2, 2002 – OVW TV Taping: Mark Jindrak and Matt Morgan defeated Bane and Lance Cade..

October 16, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: Matt Morgan defeated Lance Cade in a dark match.

October 23, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: Matt Morgan defeated Mark Magnus in a dark match.

November 6, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: Johnny Jeter and Matt Morgan defeated Seven and Bane w/Synn.

November 13, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: Sean O’Haire and Lance Cade defeated Matt Morgan and Mark Magnus.

November 20, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: Matt Morgan defeated Seven by disqualification.

December 4, 2002-Ohio Valley Wresting: B.J. Payne and Matt Morgan defeated Lance Cade and Rene Dupree.

January 8, 2003-Ohio Valley Wresting: Chris Cage and Mark Magnus defeated The Deciples of Synn (BJ Payne and Matt Morgan).

January 15, 2003-Ohio Valley Wresting: Travis Bane and Seven defeated Deciples Of Synn (B.J Payne and Matt Morgan w/Synn).

January 29, 2003 – OVW Taping: Matt Morgan defeated Mark Magnus and Chris Cage in a handicap match..

February 26, 2003 – OVW Taping: Rene Dupree and Lance Cade defeated BJ Payne and Matt Morgan..

March 2003: Matt Morgan declines an invitation to join Kenny Bolin’s Bolin Services..

March 12, 2003 – OVW Taping: Matt Morgan defeats Mark Magnus and Chris Cage in a “handicap” match..

April 11, 2003 – OVW Spring Breakout: Kane defeated Matt Morgan, then helped Morgan fend off Bolin Services..

World Wrestling Entertainment:

October 30, 2003 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan debuts as a member of the biggest team in wrestling history — TEAM LESNAR!

November 6, 2003 – Smackdown!: Kurt Angle and Chris Benoit vs Brock Lesnar,A-Train,Matt Morgan and Nathan Jones ended in a no contest in a handicap match..

November 16, 2003 – Survivor Series: Team Angle defeated Team Lesnar with Chris Benoit & John Cena coming out as Survivors!

November 20, 2003 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan destroys Shannon Moore (Punishment for Matt Hardy jumping to RAW)..

November 27, 2003 – Smackdown!: Chris Benoit defeated Matt Morgan..

December 18, 2003 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan defeated Sho Funaki in a match taped for Velocity..

December 18, 2003 – Smackdown!: Hardcore Holly and Shannon Moore defeated A-Train and Matt Morgan to reinstate Hardcore Holly!!

January 8, 2004 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan defeated Shannon Moore in a match taped for Velocity..

January 15, 2004 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan defeated Orlando Jordan in a match taped for Velocity.

January 22, 2004 – Smackdown!: Chris Benoit and John Cena managed to defeated Rhyno, Matt Morgan, Big Show and Brock Lesnar in a handicap match!

Ohio Valley Wrestling:

Late 2004: Chris Cage beat Matt Morgan to win the OVW title (Morgan stated if he lost he’d never show his face in OVW again)..

Matt Morgan begins wrestling in OVW under a mask as “The Blueprint” (kind of a Midnight Rider type deal)..

January 27, 2005–OVW: The Blue Print and Vengeance beat Johnny Jeter and Matt Cappotelli & The Heartbreakers in a 3-WAY..

February 9, 2005–Ohio Valley Wrestling: Elijah Burke and Mark Henry beat The Blue Print and Vengeance after Lance Storm did a run-in!

February 19, 2005–Ohio Valley Wrestling: Elijah Burke and Mark Henry defeated The Blue Print and Vengeance..

February 23, 2005–OVW: Elijah Burke defeated The Blue Print (Matt Morgan) to retain the heavyweight title..

March 2, 2005–Ohio Valley Wrestling: The Blue Print (Matt Morgan) defeated Nick Nemeth..

World Wrestling Entertainment:

April 21, 2005 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan redebuted with a “Studdering” gimmick and defeated Bret Matthews..

April 28, 2005 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan defeated Mikey Whiplash..

May 5, 2005 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan defeated Rob Eckos..

May 12, 2005 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan destroyed Sho Funaki..

May 19, 2005 – Smackdown!: Carlito Cool introduced his new ‘back up’ — in the form of 7′ Matt Morgan!

May 22, 2005 – Judgment Day: Carlito Cool defeated The Big Show after Matt Morgan F5’d The Big Show behind the refs back!

May 26, 2005 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan defeated Shannon Moore in a match taped for Velocity..

~~~The Big Show defeated Carlito Cool (Matt Morgan came down and F5’d Big Show through the announce table!)..

May 29, 2005 – Live Event: The Big Show defeated Matt Morgan and Carlito Cool in a handicap match.

June 2, 2005 – Smackdown!: John Cena and The Big Show (taped shoulder and ribs) defeated Carlito Cool and Matt Morgan..

June 5, 2005 – Live Event: Bubba Ray Dudley and D-Von Dudley defeated Matt Morgan and Carlito Cool in a tables match.

June 12, 2005 – ECW One Night Stand: Carlito and Matt Morgan sat in the balcony as part of an anti-ECW crusade led by Eric Bischoff..

~~~Bischoff’s boys were shocked when Steve Austin showed up after the main event to throw a beer bash in honor of ECW..

~~~Steve Austin, surrounded by ECW, challenegd the anti-ECW crusaders sitting in the balcony to come to the right for a fight!

~~~The anti-ECW crusaders came down and squared off with ECW in a huge brawl which ended with ECW standing TALL!!

June 16, 2005 – Smackdown!: The Big Show defeated Matt Morgan by disqualification when Carlito Cool whacked him with a chair!

~~~After the match, Matt Morgan tried to F5 Big Show, but it was reversed and Big Show chokeslammed Morgan through the table!!!

June 17, 2005–Live Event: Matt Morgan defeated Sho Funaki.

June 18-19, 2005–Live Event: Matt Morgan defeated Mark Jindrak.

June 26, 2005–Live Event: Charlie Haas defeated Matt Morgan.

July 1, 2005–Live Event in Japan: The Big Show defeated Carlito Cool (Akebono prevented Matt Morgan from interfering..

July 2, 2005–Live Event in Japan: The Big Show and Akebono defeated Carlito Cool and Matt Morgan in a tag team match..

July 4, 2005 – Smackdown!: Matt Morgan vs William Regal was interrupted by the lucha-trio of The Mexicools..

July 6, 2005: Matt Morgan was released from his WWE contract along with a dozen or so others..

New Japan Pro Wrestling:

August 27, 2006–Ballpark Brawl: Monty Brown defeated Matt Morgan w/Hellcat in Buffalo, New York..

October 8, 2005–New Japan PPV: Matt Morgan defeated Yuji Nagata (Former IWGP Champion)..

October 15, 2005–Christian Wrestling Entertainment: Matt Morgan (managed by Jim Cornette) squashed Timmy J and Jet Asher..

December 3 2005–NJPW: Mark Jindrak and Matt Morgan defeated Manabu Nakanishi and Takashi Iizuka..

December 4, 2005–NJPW: Yuji Nagata and Shinsuke Nakamura defeated Mark Jindrak and Matt Morgan..

December 6, 2005–NJPW: Manabu Nakanishi and Hiroshi Tanahashi defeated Mark Jindrak and Matt Morgan..

December 7, 2005–NJPW: Mark Jindrak and Matt Morgan defeated Osamu Nishimura and Yutaka Yoshie..

December 8, 2005–NJPW: Mark Jindrak and Matt Morgan defeated Manabu Nakanishi and Hiroshi Nagao..

December 9, 2005–NJPW: Hiroyoshi Tenzan and Tatsutoshi Goto defeated Mark Jindrak and Matt Morgan..

December 10, 2005–NJPW: Mark Jindrak and Matt Morgan defeated Osamu Nishimura and Toru Yano..

December 11, 2005–NJPW: Manabu Nakanishi and Shinsuke Nakamura defeated Matt Morgan and Mark Jindrak..

January 29, 2006–Nu-Wrestling Evolution: Andrew “Test” Martin defeated Matt Morgan in a “Lumberjack match”..

October 28, 2006–Rings of Europe: Matt Morgan took part in a 20 Man Over the Top Rope Royal Rumble Match

~~~Matt Morgan, Joe E. Legend and Big Van Walter were the remaining three in this Main Event Match..

November 10, 2006–Far North Wrestling: Matt Morgan defeated Calvin Mcgrath to win the FNW Heavyweight title..

May 18, 2007: Matt Morgan defeated Prophet to retain the Heavywieght title at a show in Lawrenceburg, Kentucky..

Total Nonstop Action – bodyguard Matt Morgan:

August 9, 2007 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan debuted with TNA as the bodyguard for TNA Management Jim Cornette..

September 9, 2007 – TNA No Surrender: Matt Morgan got involved seperating Christian Cage and Samoa Joe after their match..

October 14, 2007 – TNA Bound For Glory: Samoa Joe defeated Christian Cage with Matt Morgan as the Special Enforcer…

November 1 & 8, 2007 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan played the role of “authority figure” while Jim Cornette took 2-weeks off..

November 15, 2007 – TNA iMPACT: Jim Cornette put Matt Morgan on probation for taking his authority figure role too seriously..

January 31, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Jim Cornette tried to get Samoa Joe to sign a five-year contract but Matt Morgan screwed it up!

March 2008: Matt Morgan was offered a contract to be one of the Gladiators on the 2nd season of “American Gladiators”..

Total Nonstop Action – wrestler Matt Morgan:

April 3, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Sting defeated “Cowboy” James Storm w/Jackie Moore with Matt Morgan as the referee..

~~~Matt Morgan shocked the world by helping Sting and joining Team Cage against Team Tomko for Lethal Lockdown..

~~~Matt Morgan had led Team Tomko to believe he was on their side but swerved everybody by joining Team Cage!

April 10, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Jim Cornette mutually relieved Matt Morgan of his duties within TNA Management..

~~~MAIN EVENT: Kevin Nash & Sting defeated Team 3-D (Ray and Devon) by disqualification after Tomko and A.J. Styles interfered!

~~~Christian Cage and Rhino joined in for a huge brawl, then James Storm and Jackie Moore, followed by Big Matt Morgan!

~~~~Jackie Moore jumped on Matt Morgan’s back, so he picked her up and gorilla-pressed her over the top rope!

April 13, 2008 – TNA Lockdown: Team Cage defeated Team Tomko in a Lethal Lockdown (War Games/Six Sides of Steel) Match..

~~~Christian Cage & Kevin Nash & Rhino & Sting & Matt Morgan defeated Tomko & A.J. Styles & Team 3-D & James Storm..

~~~~James Storm smashed a beer bottle over Matt Morgan’s head but got GORED and pinned by Rhino to end the match..

April 17, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan cut a promo saying he is a blue-print of how a giant should be in pro-wrestling..

Total Nonstop Action – “Cowboy” James Storm w/Jackie Moore vs. Matt Morgan:

April 17, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Sting, Booker T and BG James defeated James Storm, Robert Roode and Kip James..

~~~Cowboy James Storm was going to use a beer bottle but Matt Morgan came in and kicked the Cowboy right in the head!

May 8, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: “The Blue Print” Matt Morgan defeated Kip James by Knockout in a Grudge Match!

May 11, 2008 – TNA Sacrifice: LAX defeated Matt Morgan and Kip James in the 1st Round of the Deuces Wild Tournament..

May 22, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Robert Roode defeated Matt Morgan in a King of the Mountain Qualifying match..

June 5, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Homicide, Hernandez and Matt Morgan defeated Kip James, James Storm and Lance Hoyt..

Total Nonstop Action – The Evolution of Matt Morgan:

June 2008: Matt Morgan was featured in a series of “Rough Cut” videos to elevate his status as a TNA star..

July 10, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Petey Williams, Tomko and Kip James defeated BG James, Eric Young and Matt Morgan..

July 17, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Jimmy Rave (2 minutes) | Matt Morgan defeated Lance Hoyt (3 minutes)..

TNA acknowledged that Matt Morgan had just debuted as a regular character on AMERICAN GLADIATORS

July 24, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Kory Chavis with the Hellevator in a Squash match..

July 31, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Sal Rinauro with the Hellavator in a Squash match..

August 7, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Participated in an 8-Man Dual Entrance Weapons Gauntlet Over-The-Top Elimination match..

~~~~A.J. Styles & Matt Morgan & B.G. James & Samoa Joe (Joe survived!) beat Kurt Angle & Tomko & Kip James & Booker T..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan & Abyss vs. Team 3-D:

August 14, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Johnny Devine (Team 3-D attack Morgan until Abyss makes the save!)

August 21, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Frankie Capone (Team 3-D attack Morgan until Abyss makes the save!)

September 11, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Kurt Angle and Booker T defeated Matt Morgan and Abyss after interference from Team 3-D ..

September 14, 2008 – TNA No Surrender: Matt Morgan and Abyss defeated Team 3-D (Brothers Ray and Devon)..

~~~After the match, Rey whacked Matt Morgan with a chair and gave it to Abyss so Morgan thought Abyss hit him..

September 2008: Matt Morgan had his DNA sent to the international space station in October for “Opperation Immortality.”

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan & Abyss in Monster’s Ball:

September 18, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan apologized to Abyss for the misunderstanding at No Surrender..

September 25, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan and Abyss defeated The Rock and Rave Infection (Lance Rock and Jimmy Rave)..

October 2, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Beer Money, LAX, Team 3-D, and Morgan/Abyss set up a Monster’s Ball at Bound For Glory..

October 9, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan and Abyss beat TNA Tag Team champions Beer Money Inc. in a non-title match..

October 12, 2008 – TNA Bound For Glory: Beer Money Inc. won a 4-WAY Monster’s Ball to retain the TNA world tag team titles..

~~~Robert Roode & James Storm w/Jackie Moore beat Matt Morgan and Abyss & Team 3-D and LAX (Homicide and Hernandez)..

~~~~Brothers Ray & Devon power-bombed Abyss off of the stage through a flaming table – setting Abyss on fire!!

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan & Abyss vs. Kurt Angle:

October 16, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Kurt Angle defeated Matt Morgan (who was distracted thinking about his friend, Abyss)..

~~~Kurt Angle applied the Ankle-lock after the match until Abyss made the save – then Angle attacked Abyss’ burnt backside!

October 23, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Beer Money defeated Team 3-D and LAX and Morgan/Abyss in a Hardcore Gauntlet match!

November 6, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Morgan/Abyss beat Team 3-D and LAX and Tanahashi/Volador in a 4-WAY Ladder match..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan & Abyss vs. Beer Money Inc.:

November 20, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Kevin Nash and Kurt Angle defeated Matt Morgan and Abyss after interference from Beer Money..

December 4, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: Beer Money Inc. partied with Abyss and got him drunk and them beat the living crap out of him!

December 7, 2008 – TNA Final Resolution: Beer Money Inc. beat Matt Morgan and Abyss to retain the TNA world tag team titles..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan & Abyss vs. Beer Money Inc.:

December 11, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: James Storm w/Jackie Moore defeated “The Monster” Abyss in a Beer Bottle on a Pole Match..

~~~BM Inc. stomped Abyss until Matt Morgan made the save. Storm smashed the beer bottle over Mogan’s head! Abyss saved!

December 18, 2008 – TNA iMPACT: The Main Event Mafia (Scott Steiner & Booker T w/Sharmell) defeated Matt Morgan & Abyss..

~~~~Abyss took a blind swing at Sharmell at ringside, and she pretended like he hit her – sending Abyss into instant confusion..

January 8, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan w/Abyss defeated Robert Roode (w/James Storm & Jackie Moore) by Countout..

January 11, 2009 – TNA Genesis: Beer Money beat Creed/Lethal and Morgan/Abyss in a 3-WAY to win the TNA Tag Team titles

~~~Robert Roode & James Storm w/Jackie Moore beat Consequences Creed & Jay Lethal (champs) and Matt Morgan & Abyss..

Total Nonstop Action: Matt Morgan vs. Abyss (Against All Odds):

January 15, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Lethal Consequences (Jay Lethal and Consequences Creed) defeated Matt Morgan and Abyss..

~~~~After the match, Abyss and Matt Morgan started to fight and had to be separated by TNA security..

January 22, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan apologized to Abyss and they hugged – they agree to go to therapy together..

~~~~Beer Money (Robert Roode and James Storm) beat Matt Morgan and Abyss in a First Blood match when Morgan turned on Abyss!

January 29, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Petey Williams in a match where Petey’s arm was tied behind his back..

February 8, 2009 – TNA Against All Odds: Abyss defeated Matt Morgan in an Anything Goes match..

~~~After the match, Abyss poured out some thumb tacks in the ring, but Matt Morgan quickly retreated backstage.

Total Nonstop Action: Matt Morgan vs. Abyss (Destination X):

February 12, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Beer Money Inc. defeated Abyss and Rhino after interference from Matt Morgan…

February 19, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: LAX and Shane Sewell defeated Matt Morgan, Brutus Magnus and Sheik Abdul Bashir..

March 5, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Shane Sewell – and then challenged Abyss to a 10,000 Thumb Tacks match..

March 12, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Beer Money Inc. w/Jackie Moore defeated Abyss & Team 3-D in a six man tag..

~~~Matt Morgan brought out thumb tacks and threatened to drop Lauren Brooke on them but Abyss recovered and rescued her..

March 15, 2009 – TNA Destination X: Matt Morgan defeated Abyss in a Match of 10,000 Thumb Tacks..

Total Nonstop Action: Matt Morgan vs. Abyss (Lockdown):

March 26, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Participated in a gauntlet match where the co-winners get to be captains for Lethal Lockdown..

April 16, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Abyss and Daffney defeated ODB and Cody Deaner in a mixed tag team match..

~~~~After the match, Matt Morgan attacked Abyss from behind and flattened him with a Carbon Footprint..

April 19, 2009 – TNA Lockdown: Matt Morgan defeated Abyss in a Doomsday Chamber of Blood match after Dr. Stevie interfered!

Total Nonstop Action: Matt Morgan and the Main Event Mafia:

April 30, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan began offering his services to Kurt Angle and the Main Event Mafia..

May 7, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Main Event Mafia Security (Big Sal & Rocco) in a Handicap match..

May 10, 2009–Blood, Sweat & Ears: Kryme Tyme and Matt Morgan defeated Flesh and Vlad the Penetrator w/Jason Sensation..

May 21, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Kurt Angle defeated Matt Morgan with a Small Package – Angle shook Morgan’s hand afterwards!

June 4, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: “The Blueprint” Matt Morgan defeated Petty Officer Jesse Neal w/Rhino..

June 11, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Kurt Angle beat Sting in a King of the Mountain Qualifying match with help from Matt Morgan..

June 18, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan challenged Sting to a match at Slammiversary for Sting’s position in the Mafia..

June 21, 2009 – TNA Slammiversary: Sting defeated Matt Morgan to retain his position in the Main Event Mafia..

Total Nonstop Action – Christopher Daniels vs. Matt Morgan:

June 25, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: A.J. Styles called out Samoa Joe to explain why he joined the Mafia and they started to brawl..

~~~Matt Morgan helped Joe and Christopher Daniels made the save – the Mafia beat up Styles/Daniels until Sting made the save!

June 26, 2009–Beach Brawl: Big O Inc. (Brusier Mastino and Cannonball Grizzly) defeated Matt Morgan and Homicide in Omaha, NE..

July 2, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan helped the Main Event Mafia attack A.J. Styles so Chris Daniels went after Morgan..

July 9, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: A.J. Styles and Christopher Daniels defeated Kevin Nash and Matt Morgan..

July 19, 2009 – TNA Victory Road: Matt Morgan defeated Christopher Daniels with the Hellevator..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan in the main event!:

July 30, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: A.J. Styles defeated Matt Morgan in match ONE of a #1 Contenders Three Match Series..

August 6, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated A.J. Styles in match TWO of a #1 Contenders Three Match Series..

August 13, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan w/Kurt Angle defeated A.J. Styles w/Sting in match #3 of a Three Match Series..

~~~Matt Morgan earned the right to compete in the Hard Justice triple threat match with TNA champion Kurt Angle and Sting..

August 16, 2009 – TNA Hard Justice: Kurt Angle defeated Sting and Matt Morgan to retain the TNA World Heavyweight title..

Total Nonstop Action – Kurt Angle vs. Matt Morgan vs. Sting vs. A.J. Styles:

August 20, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Team 3-D (Brothers Ray and Devon) defeated Kurt Angle and Matt Morgan..

August 27, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Sting & A.J. Styles & Hernandez defeated Matt Morgan & Booker T & Scott Steiner..

September 10, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Sting & A.J. Styles successfully created dissension between Kurt Angle & Matt Morgan..

~~~MAIN EVENT: A.J. Styles & Christopher Daniels beat The Main Event Mafia (Kurt Angle & Samoa Joe w/Matt Morgan)..

~~~~Matt Morgan held up his chair for Angle, but Styles pushed Angle into it! Morgan then gave Angle the Hellavator!

September 17, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: TNA X-Division champion Samoa Joe vs. Matt Morgan ended in a No Contest..

~~~Kurt Angle ended up interfering – kicking Matt Morgan between the legs and Angle-slamming him through a table!

September 20, 2009 – TNA No Surrender: Hernandez cashed in his Feast of Fired briefcase and turned the 4-WAY into a 5-WAY..

~~~A.J. Styles defeated Kurt Angle (c) and Sting and Matt Morgan and Hernandez to win the TNA World Heavyweight title!

Total Nonstop Action – Kurt Angle vs. Matt Morgan (Bound For Glory):

September 24, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Hernandez defeated Kurt Angle & Eric Young in a tag team match..

October 1, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan vs. Eric Young ended in a No Contest when a fan hit Morgan with a chair..

~~~The “fan” was Kurt Angle wearing an Abyss mask – then a brawl broke out between World Elite and Main Event Mafia!

October 8, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Abyss & Matt Morgan defeated Kurt Angle & Mick Foley in a tag team match..

October 18 , 2009 – TNA Bound For Glory: Kurt Angle defeated Matt Morgan – they shook hands after this great match..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan & Hernandez (Turning Point):

October 22, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Scott Steiner..

October 29, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Rhino – (Rhino attacked Morgan until Hernandez made the save!)..

November 5, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Hernandez beat IWGP Tag Team champions Team 3-D by DQ in a Non-title..

~~~Rhino came out and passed a chair to Brother Ray, but he refused to use it and set it down – telling Rhino to GO AWAY!

~~~Moments later Ray got frustrated watching Devon get beat up so he picked up the chair and smashed Hernandez for the disqualification!

November 12, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Rhino & Team 3-D challenged Matt Morgan & Hernandez to find a partner for Turning Point..

November 15 , 2009 – TNA Turning Point: Rhino & Team 3-D defeated Matt Morgan & Hernandez & Pope D’Angelo Dinero..

Total Nonstop Action – vs. The Team 3-D Wrecking Crew:

November 19, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Rhino & Team 3-D beat Matt Morgan & Hernandez & Pope D’Angelo Dinero in a Street Fight..

~~~~The finish saw Jesse Neal show up and whack Hernandez with a chair, then put Rhino on top of him for the 1-2-3 and the victory..

December 10, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: The Team 3-D Wrecking Crew attacked Pope D’Angelo Dinero backstage before the 8-man tag..

~~~Team 3-D (Brothers Ray & Devon) & Rhino & Jesse Neal defeated Matt Morgan & Hernandez & SUICIDE in a Handicap match..

December 17, 2009 – TNA iMPACT: Brother Ray defeated Matt Morgan in a Lumberjack match after Jesse Neal low-blowed Morgan..

~~~~The LUMBERJACKS: Brother Devon & Rhino & Jesse Neal and Hernandez & Pope D’Angelo Dinero & SUICIDE..

December 20, 2009 – TNA Final Resolution: Matt Morgan was the sole survivor of a big eight man tag team Elimination match!

~~~Hernandez & Matt Morgan & Pope D’Angelo Finero & SUICIDE defeated Team 3-D (Ray & Devon) & Rhino & Jesse Neal..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan & Hernandez:

January 4, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Hernandez & Matt Morgan defeated Raven & Dr. Stevie w/Daffney..

January 14, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Hernandez & Matt Morgan vs. Beer Money Inc. ended in a No Contest after Big Rob interfered..

January 17, 2010 – TNA Genesis: Matt Morgan & Hernandez defeated The British Invasion w/Big Rob to win the Tag Team titles..

January 21, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Hernandez defeated The British Invasion w/Big Rob to retain the Tag Team titles..

February 4, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Hernandez defeated Team 3-D to retain the TNA World Tag Team titles..

~~~The Nasty Boys attacked Team 3-D after the match until Hernandez & Morgan made the save – earning the respect of 3-D..

February 11, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated SUICIDE in an Eight Card Stud Qualifying match..

February 14, 2010 – TNA Against All Odds: Matt Morgan defeated Hernandez in an Eight Card Stud 1st Round match..

~~~Pope D’Angelo Dinero defeated Matt Morgan in the 2nd Round (The Pope would go on to win the whole tournament!)..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan & Hernandez:

February 25, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Hernandez granted Beer Money Inc. a tag team title shot without consulting Matt Morgan..

March 4, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Participated in a 4-Corners Tag Team match including champions but it was a Non-title match..

~~~Beer Money Inc. defeated Matt Morgan & Hernandez (c) and The Motor City Machine Guns and Generation Me in a 4-WAY..

March 15, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Beer Money Inc. defeated Hernandez in a Handicap match with guest referee Jeff Jarrett..

~~~~Matt Morgan joined in on commentary, but would not help his tag team partner because Hernandez got himself involved..

March 21, 2010 – TNA Destination X: Matt Morgan & Hernandez defeated Beer Money Inc. to retain the TNA Tag Team titles..

~~~After the match; Matt Morgan knocked Hernandez out with a Carbon Footprint and held both tag titles above his head..

March 22, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan vs. Hernandez ended in a No Contest when Morgan destroyed Hernandez with a kick..

Total Nonstop Action – TNA World Tag Team champions Matt Morgan:

April 5, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan cut a bizarre promo refering to himself as “WE” defending the tag team titles..

April 12, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Amazing Red defeated The Motor City Machine Guns to retain the Tag Team titles..

~~~After the match; Matt Morgan attacked Amazing Red and tried to destroy him but the Motor City Machine Guns made the save!

April 26, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Jesse Neal vs. Team 3D (Brother Ray & Devon) ended in a No Contest..

~~~Kevin Nash & Scott Hall interfered and brawled with Team 3-D – while Matt Morgan beat the living crap out of Jesse Neal!

~~~Hulk Hogan forced Morgan to face Neal in the ring… Morgan low-blowed him, and Shannon Moore ran out to make the save!

May 13, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan vs. Generation Me ended in a No Contest when Samoa Joe gave Morgan a Muscle Buster!

~~~The Band (Kevin Nash & Scott Hall w/Eric Young) defeated Matt Morgan (all by himself) to win the TNA World Tag Team titles..

~~~~NOTES: Kevin Nash cashed in his Feast or Fired tag team title shot which he won at Final Resolution back on December 20th..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan vs. Hernandez (Slammiversary):

May 27, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Kurt Angle had a confrontation with Matt Morgan before Samoa Joe showed up and Morgan retreated..

June 3, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Sting vs. Samoa Joe ended in a No Contest after interference from Matt Morgan & Rob Van Dam..

~~~TNA World Heavyweight champion Rob Van Dam defeated Sting and Samoa Joe and Matt Morgan in a 4-WAY Non-title match..

~~~Matt Morgan was distracted when he saw Hernandez in the crowd.. Joe hit a Muscle-buster and RVD hit a 5-Star Frog Splash!

June 10, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan was assigned a tag team partner (Hernandez) but they just got into a big fight in the ring..

~~~The Band (Scott Hall & Eric Young w/Kevin Nash) defeated Matt Morgan (by himself) to retain the TNA World Tag Team titles..

June 13, 2010 – TNA Slammiversary: Matt Morgan defeated Hernandez by DQ in a Grudge Match..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan vs. Hernandez in a Steel Cage (Victory Road):

June 17, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Samoa Joe defeated Hernandez after outside interference from Matt Morgan (unseen by Joe)..

June 24, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Homicide attacked Matt Morgan, only to be destroyed with a Carbon Footprint on the ring post!

July 1, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Jay Lethal called out Flair/Styles, but got Matt Morgan instead…. Jay Lethal defeated Matt Morgan..

July 8, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Beer Money Inc. defeated Hernandez & The Motor City Machine Guns ..

July 11, 2010 – TNA Victory Road: Hernandez defeated Matt Morgan in a Steel Cage Grudge Match..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan:

July 15, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Pope D’Angelo Dinero defeated Matt Morgan (Mr. Anderson made the post match save for the Pope!)..

July 22, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Mr. Anderson defeated Matt Morgan (After the match, Morgan whacked Anderson with the microphone!)

July 29, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Mr. Anderson & Jeff Hardy defeated Matt Morgan & TNA Security (Gunner & Murphy) in a 2-on-3

August 5, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: The Pope defeated Orlando Jordan (After; Morgan attacked Pope until Mr. Anderson made the save!)

August 12, 2010 – The Whole F’n Show: Matt Morgan defeated Mr. Anderson and “Pope” D’Angelo Dinero in a triple threat match..

Total Nonstop Action – EV2.0 vs. FORTUNE:

August 12, 2010 – The Whole F’n Show: Tommy Dreamer (with his EV2.0 brothers) were attacked and destroyed by FORTUNE!

~~~~EV2.0 = Dreamer, Foley, Stevie Richards, Team 3-D, Rhino, Tony Luke, Guido Maritato, Sabu, Bill Alfonso, Sandman, & Raven..

~~~~FORTUNE = Ric Flair, A.J. Styles, Frankie Kazarian, Robert Roode, James Storm, Douglas Williams, Matt Morgan, & Abyss..

August 19, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: “Pope” D’Angelo Dinero defeated Matt Morgan in a tournament to crown a new TNA champion..

August 26, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: The Final Four defeated Fortune w/Ric Flair (The Final Four started fighting after the match!)

~~~Kurt Angle & Jeff Hardy & Mr. Anderson & The Pope defeated A.J. Styles & Kazarian & Douglas Williams & Matt Morgan..

September 16, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Brian Kendrick defeated Matt Morgan in an Open Challenge match..

~~~Before the match; Brian Kendrick came out to defend Tommy Dreamer and challenged anyone from Fortune to a match..

October 7, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan participated in a $100,000 Invitational Gauntlet-style Battle Royal (won by Kurt Angle)..

October 10, 2010 – TNA Bound For Glory: EV2.0 w/Mick Foley defeated Fortune w/Ric Flair in a Lethal Lockdown Steel Cage Match..

~~~~EV2.0 = Tommy Dreamer & Stevie Richards & Raven & The War Machine Rhino & Sabu w/Mick Foley..

~~~~Fortune = A.J. Styles & Frankie Kazarian & Robert Roode & James Storm & Matt Morgan w/Ric Flair..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan quits FORTUNE:

October 14, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Hulk Hogan’s “Immortal” formed an unbeatable alliance with Ric Flair’s “Fortune” faction..

~~~~Fortune (Styles & Kazarian & Beer Money & Douglas Williams w/Flair & Morgan) defeated The Pope in a Handicap match..

October 21, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: The entire Fortune faction (minus Flair) beat the hell out of Mr. Anderson and carried him to the stage!

~~~~Kazarian defeated Mr. Anderson in an Ultimate-X Match after Fortune interfered and Matt Morgan power-bombed him off the ladder!!

October 28, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan questioned Eric Bischoff’s decision to force Mr. Anderson to wrestle with a concussion..

~~~~Jeff Jarrett defeated Matt Morgan (sub for Mr. Anderson) in a chain match.. (Jarrett & Fortune hung Morgan with the chain afterwards!)

November 4, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Eric Bischoff defeated Mr. Anderson by forfeit when he no-showed (so Anderson lost his title shot)

~~~~Matt Morgan hit the ring and flattened Bischoff with a Carbon Footprint and then signed the contract for a title shot at Turning Point..

November 7, 2010 – TNA Turning Point: Jeff Hardy defeated Matt Morgan to retain the TNA World Heavyweight title..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan vs. TNA champion Jeff Hardy (Final Resolution):

November 11, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated Douglas Williams, Robert Roode & James Storm in a Handicap match..

November 18, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated a bloody Ric Flair with help from Doug Williams and Carbon Footprint!

November 25, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan & Doug Williams & Samoa Joe & The Pope vs. Fortune ended in a No Contest..

~~~~Fortune = A.J. Styles & Frankie Kazarian & Beer Money (Robert Roode & James Storm)..

~~~~TNA champion Jeff Hardy interfered and joined Fortune in a beatdown of Matt Morgan!

December 2, 2010 – TNA iMPACT: Matt Morgan defeated “The War Machine” Rhino by DQ when Fortune attacked Matt Morgan..

~~~Jeff Hardy showed up and threatened to whack Morgan in the back of the head with a chair but Mr. Anderson made the save!

December 5, 2010 – Final Resolution: Jeff Hardy defeated Matt Morgan to retain the TNA World Heavyweight title..

~~~~Guest referee Mr. Anderson (chosen by Matt Morgan) was taken out when Eric Bischoff pushed him head-first into the ring post..

Total Nonstop Action – Matt Morgan vs. Mr. Anderson (GENESIS):

December 9, 2010 – TNA IMPACT: Eric Bischoff booked Morgan vs. Anderson, even though Anderson was not medically cleared..

December 16, 2010 – TNA IMPACT: Jeff Hardy & Kazarian defeated Matt Morgan & Mr. Anderson after interference from Rob Terry..

December 23, 2010 – TNA IMPACT: Rob Van Dam, Matt Morgan, and The Motor City Machine Guns defeated Jeff Hardy, Abyss, and Beer Money.

December 30, 2010 – TNA IMPACT: Matt Morgan and Brother Devon defeated Mr. Anderson and Brother Ray.

~~~~The finish saw Matt Morgan swing at Bully Ray, but missed him and knocked Mr. Anderson in the back of the head for the WIN!

January 6, 2011 – TNA IMPACT: Mike Tenay did a sit-down interview with Mr. Anderson & Matt Morgan to hype their match at Genesis..

~~~~Later; Morgan & Anderson made an appearance in the ring, but during the chaos, Anderson accidentally whacked Morgan with a chair!

January 9, 2011 – Genesis: Mr. Anderson defeated Matt Morgan in a #1 contenders match for the TNA world heavyweight championship.

~~~~They cracked heads and a dazed Anderson rolled up Morgan for the win! Bischoff ruled that the title match would take place NOW!

~~~~Mr. Anderson defeated Jeff Hardy with lots of outside interference and a Mic Check to win the TNA world heavyweight championship!!!

~~~~Mick Foley tried to get involved but Ric Flair and Security ejected him. Matt Hardy tried to interfere but Rob Van Dam took care of him.

~~~~Finally Eric Bischoff got in the ring with a chair, but Mr. Anderson caught him and took him out with an electrifying Mic Check!

January 8, 2014 – Matt Morgan announced via twitter that him and his wife welcome a son into the world by the name of Jackson Morgan. Matt Morgan announced he was stepping away from wrestling. He also said he was not retiring from wrestling. He could not pass up this new job he is getting.
